/*------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  File Name        : fromelf.txt
  Version          : V1.00
  Date             : 2014-06-30
  Description      : The fromelf command example for bin and text.
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/

/*----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
/* Convert AXF format to Binary                                                                             */
/*----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
fromelf --bin -o "!L.bin" "!L"

/*----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
/* Convert AXF format to Disassembles                                                                       */
/*----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
fromelf --text -c -o "!L.text" "!L"
